/>
Introduction
This topic contains general information on handling cases involving a homicide, including
effect of a homicide determination on the right to benefits
responsibility for making a homicide determination
participation in wrongful and intentional killing
, and
language for denial letters to claimants implicated in the homicide of a Veteran
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B  - Considering Eligibility When Homicide Is Involved
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
